title: Data Scientist
required_experience:

description:
Job Responsibilities:
• Working collaboratively with end-users to collect information to develop and support processes, systems, and reporting which will drive productivity and efficiency.
• Utilizing SQL and relational databases to write queries, and track, analyze, and report on data and metrics.
• Create an Extract, Transform, Load process, and other documentation.
• Analyze data generated from the app to create data visualizations for reporting purposes.
• Training on and troubleshooting technical and data-related platforms.
• Oversight of workflow efficiency, project management, and process mapping efforts.
• Coordinate with IT Team at the client-side to set up the database at the backend of the Application, create views and interlink the app data to other software platforms.
• Assists users by answering functionality questions and follows up on any SQL-related problems.

Qualification & Experience:
• Master’s degree in information systems, computer science, computer systems engineering, database administration, mathematics, or related field.
• 0 – 2 years Data Analysis experience.
• Proficient in MS SQL Server is a must.
• Experience with Data Analysis/statistical tools such as Python or R.
• Experience with data visualization using Tableau, PowerBi, Spotfire or similar tools.
• Experience with front-end languages such as C#, PHP, Node.js considered an advantage.
• Experience in the Oil & Gas industry considered an advantage.
• Must be Willing to Work in the Office in Houston.

Eligibility to work in the USA:
• Will be hired on OPT visa and H-1B visa will be sponsored.
